p: We cut cross sections of N. megapotamica leaves by hand. The material was stained with NADI reagent (naphthol and N-Diethyl- p-phenylenediamine), ferric chloride, Sudan IV, and Nile blue sulfate [ 23]. The images were captured under microscope Leica Microsystems with 100x, 200x, 400x and 1000x magnification.
